name: LiveProcess Corp.
overview:
LiveProcess provides a patented web-based platform for emergency management professionals at hospitals, healthcare organizations and regional coordinating entities. The LiveProcess platform enables organizations to prepare for disasters and emergencies, comply with Joint Commission and NIMS, and effectively respond to events.

Used today by hundreds of healthcare organizations nationwide, the LiveProcess platform has the exclusive endorsement from the American Hospital Association as their preferred solution for disaster readiness and incident command.

LiveProcess is headquartered in Verona, NJ. For more information, visit www.liveprocess.com.

external_links.title: DFW Hospitals Armed with New Emergency Tool
